title: Chubb's 3Q Profit Falls, Net Premiums Written Rise
text:
By Allison Prang

Chubb Ltd.'s (CB) profit fell from a year prior while net premiums written rose.

Chubb's net income in the third quarter was $1.09 billion, down 11% from the comparable quarter a year ago. Earnings were $2.38 a share, down from $2.64 a share.

Chubb's core operating earnings were $2.70 a share, up from $2.41 a share.

Net premiums written were $8.62 billion, up 6.3%. Analysts were expecting $7.87 billion.

The company reported $155 million in net realized losses.

Write to Allison Prang at allison.prang@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 29, 2019 16:45 ET (20:45 GMT)
